channel.title: SlewScape 718/742
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2qimmb9.png[/img][/center]
718/742 Runescape Private Server
Have you been looking for something different? The new hype? Tired of all these servers who have unfinished features, not enough features, or are just down right rude?
Then welcome to SlewScape! As the owner of SlewScape, my goal is to make the server into what the players want. I don't just take suggestions and throw them out, I take them, write them down, spread the word; and if popular demand says so, I add the suggestion!
So what can we possibly add that is different from any regular server? To be honest, no matter how much we code, plan, etc, in the end every private server is the same when it comes to features. But thats just features.. At SlewScape we strive to have the perfect staff, members who are there for you, listen to what you say, and help you in any possible way!
Don't be one of the silly ones who log in and think this server is just like any other one, don't be a fool! Stick around and you are sure to see the servers true colors!
So what are you waiting for? Go play!
Download webclient: [size=14pt](It may take some time to load at start and when you login, so give it some time download the cache :D)[/size] If you are still lagging in game open your graphics settings>custom>and choose opengl or any other display mode which suits you! http://www.sendspace.com/file/gcj55b http://depositfiles.com/files/y6fnt9hj6
forums : http://slewscape.netau.net/ (you must login to view information and topics on forums)
Features: Eco based. Perfect PvM/PvP/Prayers. Perfect switching. All skills 25 working! Donator zone! Fully working barbarian agility course + advanced! Fully working Gnome agility course + advanced!
A huge list of Player versus Monster teleports, being added more almost every day. Many working aura's, like Supreme corruption, Salvation and Harmony. All for sale! Squeal of fortune. Xp Counter. Money Pouch. No items lost on death, unless you die in the wilderness, or in any unsafe PvP zone or at Corp! Nex sets with HP bonusses. Awesome xp in skilling, and combat. Including automated double EXP weekends. Easy teleporting/traveling by single click actions thanks to the quest tab. Handy noticeboard, which allows you to change your display name, and character look. Custom shop names, so it will be easy to find what you need. Loyality system: this gives you 250 points for playing each 30 minutes, these points can be used to buy aura's at the loyality shop. Nice starters, splitted in the combat triangle. you can either become a Melee'r for a melee starting set, Ranger for ranged or Mager for magic. And alot more, would be too long to write it all down here, just come and try for yourself.
Furthermore, Home is easily accesed by typing ::home. If you need some cash fast, try thieving a bit and sell the stolen goods to the general store. you could also loot anything you find, everything can be sold. If you need any help, feel free to add khayam and/or mod robby to friends ingame and just ask.
have a nice time!
[b]Pictures:[/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2lscguc.png[/img] [b]Advanced Gnome Agility[/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/j6mxyo.jpg[/img] [b]Working DKS with combat triangle![/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2jzmki.png[/img] [b]Ingame-Highscores[/b] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2s0jkuf.jpg[/img] [b]Slayer helm has now been released! gives double slayer points when completing slayer tasks![/b] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2cxx077.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/71tthc.jpg[/img] [b]Completionist cape added![/b] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2yl7l7n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/wu1pug.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/67pbfk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2eld1cx.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5v0w9e.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/5b1zjq.jpg[/img] [b]Nomads Requiem:[/b] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/mrv6gn.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2url3lk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/vzhu14.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2en2u15.jpg[/img] [b]More Gwd Pics![/b] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2zg7l7p.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2n25g7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2rwqjjl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2v9c4s9.png[/img]
[size=36pt][b]Much more content join now!!![/b][/size]

item.description:
@khayam wrote:

[center] [/center]

718/742 Runescape Private Server

Have you been looking for something different? The new hype? Tired of all these servers who have unfinished features, not enough features, or are just down right rude?

Then welcome to SlewScape! As the owner of SlewScape, my goal is to make the server into what the players want. I don’t just take suggestions and throw them out, I take them, write them down, spread the word; and if popular demand says so, I add the suggestion!

So what can we possibly add that is different from any regular server? To be honest, no matter how much we code, plan, etc, in the end every private server is the same when it comes to features. But thats just features… At SlewScape we strive to have the perfect staff, members who are there for you, listen to what you say, and help you in any possible way!

Don’t be one of the silly ones who log in and think this server is just like any other one, don’t be a fool! Stick around and you are sure to see the servers true colors!

So what are you waiting for? Go play!

If you are still lagging in game open your graphics settings>custom>and choose opengl or any other display mode which suits you!

(you must login to view information and topics on forums)

Features:
Eco based.
Perfect PvM/PvP/Prayers.
Perfect switching.
All skills 25 working!
Donator zone!
Fully working barbarian agility course + advanced!
Fully working Gnome agility course + advanced!

A huge list of Player versus Monster teleports, being added more almost every day.
Many working aura’s, like Supreme corruption, Salvation and Harmony. All for sale!
Squeal of fortune.
Xp Counter.
Money Pouch.
No items lost on death, unless you die in the wilderness, or in any unsafe PvP zone or at Corp!
Nex sets with HP bonusses.
Awesome xp in skilling, and combat. Including automated double EXP weekends.
Easy teleporting/traveling by single click actions thanks to the quest tab.
Handy noticeboard, which allows you to change your display name, and character look.
Custom shop names, so it will be easy to find what you need.
Loyality system: this gives you 250 points for playing each 30 minutes, these points can be used to buy aura’s at the loyality shop.
Nice starters, splitted in the combat triangle. you can either become a Melee’r for a melee starting set, Ranger for ranged or Mager for magic.
And alot more, would be too long to write it all down here, just come and try for yourself.

Furthermore, Home is easily accesed by typing ::home.
If you need some cash fast, try thieving a bit and sell the stolen goods to the general store. you could also loot anything you find, everything can be sold.
If you need any help, feel free to add khayam and/or mod robby to friends ingame and just ask.

have a nice time!
